member.name: F:Avalonia.Win32.Interop.UnmanagedMethods.WINDOWPLACEMENT.Length
member.summary:
The length of the structure, in bytes. Before calling the GetWindowPlacement or SetWindowPlacement functions, set this member to sizeof(WINDOWPLACEMENT).
GetWindowPlacement and SetWindowPlacement fail if this member is not set correctly.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Win32.Interop.UnmanagedMethods.WINDOWPLACEMENT.Flags
member.summary: Specifies flags that control the position of the minimized window and the method by which the window is restored.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Win32.Interop.UnmanagedMethods.WINDOWPLACEMENT.ShowCmd
member.summary: The current show state of the window.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Win32.Interop.UnmanagedMethods.WINDOWPLACEMENT.MinPosition
member.summary: The coordinates of the window's upper-left corner when the window is minimized.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Win32.Interop.UnmanagedMethods.WINDOWPLACEMENT.MaxPosition
member.summary: The coordinates of the window's upper-left corner when the window is maximized.

member.name: F:Avalonia.Win32.Interop.UnmanagedMethods.WINDOWPLACEMENT.NormalPosition
member.summary: The window's coordinates when the window is in the restored position.

member.name: T:Avalonia.Shared.PlatformSupport.AssetLoader
member.summary: Loads assets compiled into the application binary.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Shared.PlatformSupport.AssetLoader.Exists(System.Uri,System.Uri)
member.summary: Checks if an asset with the specified URI exists.
member.param: A base URI to use if is relative.
member.returns: True if the asset could be found; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Shared.PlatformSupport.AssetLoader.Open(System.Uri,System.Uri)
member.summary: Opens the resource with the requested URI.
member.param: A base URI to use if is relative.
member.returns: A stream containing the resource contents.
